title: Believing the Lies
description: Believing the Lies is an urban fiction story filled with betrayal, scandal and saturated with drama. Lance and Monet are far from the perfect couple, but in her eyes they are destined to be. Blinded by love, Monet created the perfect man in Lanceâ€¦based on lies. She convinces herself that loving and believing in Lance will eventually make him realize she was the only woman he needed. Lance on the other hand, was a modern day Casanova who could charm most women right out of their panties and into the maternity ward. Monet, like many women wouldn't understand their role in his life until it was too late. All she wanted was his love and devotion, but all he gave her was lies.
author: Tomika Nicole
